title: John Tradescant the Elder
description: [MOCK DATA - description invented for prototype] John Tradescant the Elder (c. 1570-1638) was an English naturalist, gardener, and collector. Cabinet has content about the Tradescants in the context of natural history and collecting.
primarySource: Cabinet reference - details not fully scraped
